article: My father is a farmer. he lives  with  my mother in a house in a village. It is  _  the town of Ashland. My father grows rice and  _  .he works very hard. He gets up very  _  every morning. He  _  home at half past six and walks to the field. His work starts at seven o'clock. He comes  _  home for lunch. He has a short  _  after lunch. Then he goes back to work again. He often  _  his work at a quarter to six. He goes back home at a quarter past six. He usually goes to bed  _  ten o'clock.. He goes to bed earlier  _  my mother.
